snippet: Parliament refused to accept the resignation of its leader and instead adjourned for the summer, leaving uncertain the fate of a bill about granting official status to the Russian language.
lead_paragraph: Parliament refused to accept the resignation of its leader and instead adjourned for the summer, leaving uncertain the fate of a bill about granting official status to the Russian language.

headline.main: Political Maneuvering Stalls Language Bill in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Political Maneuvering Stalls Language Bill in Ukraine
